sys_script.description: If the category is "Code Sanity" then the new check should be added to the "Code Sanity" scan suite.
sys_script.message:
Are you sure that you want to add a new check to the CodeSanity app itself? Please keep in mind that the check might be deleted when the CodeSanity app is updated.

If you really want to extend the CodeSanity app itself, the name of the new check must start with "CodeSanity - ".

It is recommended to add additional checks into a separate scoped app.Â
sys_script.name: scan_check - Add to suite
